extendedInfo.description: Alarm / Clock Radio / Media player (including: Internet streamed radio)Use your Android phone as an:- Alarm: Wake up to a song, artist, album, playlist or internet streamed radio. (for Internet streamed compatible formats, see: http://developer.android.com/guide/appendix/media-formats.html) - Clock Radio: Time is displayed as your phone's time settings (Changeable here: 'Program / Settings / Date & time')- Media player: Listen to the same tunes that you wake up to when you are awake- Stopwatch (BETA - turn on: 'Menu / All settings / Tab choice / Stopwatch')- Timer (BETA - turn on: 'Menu / All settings / Tab choice / Timer').This free version is a full version, with ads support.A Pro version, without ads, is now available.Languages translated: English, Swedish, French, Spanish, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese (some with Google Translate).Please help me translate a new language or fix an already translated text. Send an email to: peter.nystrom.dev@gmail.com and I will send the files you need to translate.Known bugs:- None that I known of. [Want to report a bug, see instructions below]Enhancements to come (not in any priority order):- Create playlists in the app (currently can only play playlists added to your Android phone/tab)- Add a selection of streamed radio stations from different countries.If you find a bug, send an email to peter.nystrom.dev@gmail.com with the following:- How I can reproduce it- Your phone's data (model, resolution, Android version, language).Quick manual:-------------Time tab:- Time, date, battery: Info for you- Alarm, alarm signal: Info (Go to \'Alarm tab\' to change)- Player signal: Selected signal to play if 'On' button pressed- On/Off button: Plays selected player signal- Always on/Off in .. button: Short click will toggle between \'Always on\' and \'Off in ..\'. Long click and you can set timeout for \'Off in ..\' model- Shuffle on/off: Can only be changed when player is off- Repeat on/off: Can only be changed when player is off- Prev/Next: Shows only when player is on and if more than 1 song is chosen- Volume: Does not show with small displays (Ex. ldpi(320x480), not enough space, use the menu instead)- Dimmer: Dim the screen to increase battery life- Screensaver: Shows time, date, alarm, alarm signal and player signal.Alarm tab:- Customize an alarm: Long click on +(1),+(2),+(3),+(4) or use the menu 'Edit the default alarm (x)' to see that your are in customize mode - instead of the time you will see the name (?) of the button you clicked- Add an alarm: Short click on +(1), +(2), +(3) or +(4)- Edit an alarm: Select from the list- Delete an alarm: Long click on an alarm from the list and select 'delete alarm' or edit the alarm and press the 'Delete' button.Latest version info is in 'News'.Full version history is under 'All settings / About / Version history'.Keywords: alarm, stopwatch, timer, music player, alarm clock, clock radio, radio, countdown, streaming.

reviews.title: Started Falling Back to Ringtone
reviews.comment: A nice enough app, with a simple enough interface.  Worked well for a couple of weeks.  During that time it once fell back on the default Android ringtone, but now it seems to be a daily issue.  I even tried to test the alarms, and created a new alarm as well.  The tests and new alarm all worked while playing with the app, but when left overnight to wake me in the morning, I was back to the default Android ringtone.  Not sure what the problem is, but it\'s failing to wake me to my favorite internet radio station now, so I have to start searching for something that will.
reviews.author: Thomas Forrester

reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
reviews.comment: Works great! Now I can stream my fave radio station (KPBS) without any static. The free version\'s ads are very unobtrusive, but I bought his ad-free Pro version just to give him some few ($2) bucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No .pls support?
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work with shoutcast streams so useless for me. Thanks anyway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Changes are great. Almost perfect.
reviews.comment: The new changes are great! I\'d like to see the font color option similar to other clocks that allow you to mix and define custom colors. The new ones are great but very limited. The option to turn off song display on the screensaver is perfect. Add multiple fonts and a color mixer and you have a winner for sure. Changed my rating to five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Idk why few ppl use it, it\'s the best free alarm clock in market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Does everything I need a radio alarm clock to do.  It has a dark background once the screensaver kicks in so it doesn\'t light up the bedroom, It rotates, it has four alarms which can each be set to a song, a tone or a radio station
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: Add a radio station list and it wll get 5 stars Small bug: name of radio station is not updatd when changed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be great
reviews.comment: Great app apart from the fact that all internet streaming links I try fail to work, this isn\'t a clock radio it\'s a clock playlist.
reviews.author: Ricky Smith

reviews.title: PASSED test!
reviews.comment: WINNER! WOULD GIVE IT TEN STARS!
reviews.author: stan rook
